{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Insignia |model=Infocast |revision=NS-DP8CH |upc=600603130311 |asin=B004H1NEF6 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |fcc_date=03/18/2010 |fcc_id=N9ZNS-DP8CH |type=media player, wireless internet appliance |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP166; B0, BJD2C008, 88AP1-BJD2; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=128 KiB |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN25F10-100GIP |fla2=2 GiB |fla2_brand=SanDisk |fla2_model=MicroSD |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G831CFP-S6 |expansion_if_types=USB, Compact Flash, SDHC |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-GH321 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8686 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=bg |addl_chips=High Performance MCU;STMicro;STM32F101;;1;,,, Stereo CODEC w/ Speaker Drivers;Wolfson;WM8961;;1;,,, Multi-functional Power Management Unit;TI;LM26480;;1;,,, 2-port USB Hub Controller and Card Reader;Alcor Micro;AU6350;;1;,,, Adjustable Triple Channel TFT LCD DC/DC Converter;Advanced Analog Tech;AAT1118;;1;,,, 4-Bit Dual-Supply Bus Transceiver;TI;SN74AVC4T245;;3;,,, Backlight Driver IC;Microchip;MIC2287;;1; |flags=display 8", touchscreen, 3.5mm audio output, CompactFlash, SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.07; |stock_os=Linux; |oui=00:24:23 }}
:[http://www.insigniaproducts.com/products/cameras-camcorders-photo-frames/NS-DP8CH.html Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.chumby.com/pages/infocast Application software]
*[http://www.bunniestudios.com/blog/?p=1140 Designers blog] with board photos and a link to schematics. :Per the schematics, the device uses an ''[[AzureWave]]'' AW-GH321 :module (which is ''[[Marvell]]'' 88W8686 based).
*CPU: [[Marvell]] ''ARMADA 100'' Family :88AP162-B0-BJD2C004 @400MHz :88AP166-B0-BJD2C008 @800MHz :88AP168-B0-BJD2C010 @1000MHz
